entry.title: WIND WARNING , Gonzales Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:18 PM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Gonzales 8:00 PM PST Thursday 05 January 2023
Temperature: 9.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: 6.3°C
Wind: SSE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 near Haro Strait early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 this evening then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40. Low 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the morning. High 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the evening. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 05 January 2023
